text: Curator: HEY HEISENBERG, THIS FKING BITCOIN CRASH IS BANKRUPTING US, GO AND FIND SOME ARTIFACTS SO WE CAN HAVE MORE VISITORS
Stud: BUT I DON'T HAVE ANY BITCOIN TO BUY THEM
Curator: DOESN'T MATTER, HERE HAVE SOME GUNS NOW GO AND FIND SOME ARTIFACTS
Stud: HERE YOU GO SIR, I FOUND SOMETHING USEFUL
Curator: HMM, LOOKS WELL ENOUGH, GOODJOB NOW GO AND FIND SOME MORE
Boss: I AM THE RULER OF THE WORLD, YOU CANNOT STOP ME, I WILL COLLECT ALL THE ARTIFACTS AND I WON'T BE STOPPED!!
Stud: DID YOU FORGET TO TAKE YOU MEDICATION? IT SEEMS TO ME YOU HAVE A FEW PROBLEMS
Boss: WHAT DID YOU JUST SAY TO ME??!!! YOU STUPID LITTLE MAGGOT
Stud: JUST HAND OVER THE STUFF AND I WON'T HAVE TO HURT YOU
